title: Remove Meet the Team page

requirements.text: Remove the '/team' route from the App.tsx router configuration

quotes: okay remove the meet the team page

acceptanceCriteria: The '/team' route is no longer defined in App.tsx
Navigating to '/team' results in a 404 or redirects appropriately

requirements.text: Remove the 'Team' or 'Meet the Team' navigation link from the Layout component header menu

quotes: okay remove the meet the team page

acceptanceCriteria: The Team navigation link is removed from both desktop and mobile navigation menus
No broken links remain in the header

quotes: okay remove the meet the team page

acceptanceCriteria: The Team.tsx file no longer exists in the pages directory
No import errors occur from removing this file

constraints: Do not modify the backend or any other pages
Ensure all remaining navigation links continue to function correctly
nonGoals: Removing team member information from other pages
Modifying the footer or other layout sections
